import Layout from '../components/Layout'; export default function About() { return (

About

Looking for the first job in tech is not easy. There are tons of openings out there but no central place where these postings are listed, especially for junior roles and internships. ðŸ˜” Hire Juniors aims to solve this problem by listing all these opportunities. If you come across any job posting for a junior role or an internship, please fill-out the Typeform to get it listed. It takes only a couple of minutes to spread help someone! âœ¨

The amount of content out there can overwhelm people who are just starting their journey. hirejuniors.dev aims to list all the useful resources that can help them. We will list all the useful resources that you found useful, and that you would recommend someone. If there are resources that benefited you please share them with the community.

Let us take a step to help and welcome junior developers on this amazing journey.

); }
